events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I did not get what I paid for.
The case has been categorized as a Refund issue based on the customer's report of receiving the wrong product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect item delivered.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please confirm the order number and provide a photo of the item you received so we can proceed with your refund?
I have attached a photo of the product I got, and the order number is 789456123. Please process the refund quickly.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the credit back on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to ensure your refund was received and if you have any additional questions or concerns.
As no further issues were reported, we have now closed the refund case. Thank you for your patience.
